title: Bench the Kench
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2064044410/211305313?tab=overview
Built almost 4 Spirit Visages and had 350 MR or 78% reduced magic damage, I out damaged Lux and everyone in the game from stacking Spirit Visages

"But Meta, you shouldn't stack Spirit Visages, build \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ and have some variety from other items!"

Armor? lol Sion's the least of my worries, he is pretty easy to digest.

I mean I could have built Titanic, but I wanted more MR, the frog already squashes anything it sits on.

I could have built Locket, but that item has been mega nerfed and would hardly give me nearly as much MR as SV. Likewise I could have built BOC, but my team has no trouble pushing and it again offers peanut HP and MR.

I could have built Banshees, but that item is shit in ARAM, there are spells flying around the map at all times so it will always be popped. 

Spirit Visage gives me 500 HP, 10% CDR, 70 MR, and 150% base regen, while the unique passive does not stack, those give me all the stats a beefy tank like Tahm needs for only one item slot.
